about_the_game:
Overview
Solridge is an educational video game aligned with third-grade Common Core competencies. As the player, you will obtain gold by helping the townsfolk with their problems. If you want to save the village from disaster, you must continue gathering gold and growing stronger!

All of the townsfolk's questions are presented in a word problem format, teaching students the “real-world” applications of their classroom learnings.

Concepts Covered:
  • Finding perimeter and area of 2-D figures
  • Solving 3 digit addition and subtraction problems
  • Solving multiplication and division problems within 100
  • Partitioning a quantity into equal parts and naming those parts as fractions
  • Recount details of the text
  • Where, when, why and how key events occur
  • Determine meaning of words and phrases
  • Describe characters in a story
  • Tense practice (present/past/future)
  • Subject verb agreement
  • Pronoun antecedent agreement
  • Comparatives and superlatives
  • Capitalization of words in titles
  • Possessive nouns
  • Commas and quotations marks in dialogue


If you come across any bugs, please email me at fastbrother@me.com. In your email, please detail the bug and how to reproduce it. I will be starting school in July, but will try to fix the bug ASAP. Thank you!
